snippet: Eight Planned Parenthood organizations sued Texas on Wednesday for excluding them from participating in a program that provides contraception and check-ups to women.
abstract: Eight Planned Parenthood organizations sue Texas for excluding them from participating in a program that provides contraception and check-ups to women, saying the new state law violates their constitutional rights to freedom of speech and association.
lead_paragraph: Eight Planned Parenthood organizations sued Texas on Wednesday for excluding them from participating in a program that provides contraception and check-ups to women.
